titleStmt.title: Ode, upon the blessed restoration and returne of His Sacred Majestie, Charls the Second. By A. Cowley.
titleStmt.author: Cowley, Abraham, 1618-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop on the Lower VValk in the New Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop on the Lower VValk in the New Exchange
